alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Northern Erie; Southern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued January 18 at 3:35AM EST until January 18 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches in the most persistent lake snows. * WHERE...Erie, Genesee, and Wyoming counties. Greatest additional accumulation across central Erie County, including some of the Buffalo Southtowns. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult with snow covered roads and poor visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commute today.
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.

area.areaDesc: Genesee; Northern Erie; Southern Erie; Wyoming
